ComicInfo.Summary:
“TOTAL ECLIPSE OF THE HEART,” Part Four
You know nothing, Becky Kumar! If she wants to survive what Taranis did to her, Becky will have to learn her way around magic. But is Lady Macbeth willing to teach her? Also, an eye-opening parley with the fallen queen of the magic court of New York City.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jacopo Camagni | 1 | B | Cover B | Matteo Lolli (a) & Stefano Martinuz (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Brandon Graham | 3 |
